name: rke
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing rke cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`rke` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/rancher/terraform-provider-rke).

sans.description: List of additional hostnames and IPs to include in the api server PKI cert (list)

strategy.description: Authentication strategy that will be used in RKE k8s cluster. Default: `x509` (string)

cacheTimeout.description: Controls how long to cache authentication decisions (string)

configFile.description: Multiline string that represent a custom webhook config file (string)

mode.description: RKE mode for authorization. `rbac` and `none` modes are available. Default `rbac` (string)

port.description: Port used for SSH communication. Default `22` (string)

name.description: Name of virtualcenter config for Vsphere Cloud Provider config (string)
Name of virtualcenter config for Vsphere Cloud Provider config (string)

vsphereCloudProvider.description: Vsphere Cloud Provider config [rke-vsphere-cloud-provider](https://rancher.com/docs/rke/latest/en/config-options/cloud-providers/vsphere/) Extra argument `name` is required on `virtual_center` configuration. (list maxitems:1)

disableSecurityGroupIngress.description: Disables the automatic ingress creation. Default `false` (bool)

disableStrictZoneCheck.description: Setting this to true will disable the check and provide a warning that the check was skipped. Default `false` (bool)

elbSecurityGroup.description: Use these ELB security groups instead create new (string)

kubernetesClusterId.description: The cluster id we'll use to identify our cluster resources (string)

kubernetesClusterTag.description: Legacy cluster id we'll use to identify our cluster resources (string)

roleArn.description: IAM role to assume when interaction with AWS APIs (string)

vpc.description: The AWS VPC flag enables the possibility to run the master components on a different aws account, on a different cloud provider or on-premises. If the flag is set also the KubernetesClusterTag must be provided (string)

vpc.description: The AWS VPC flag enables the possibility to run the master components on a different aws account, on a different cloud provider or on-premises. If the flag is set also the KubernetesClusterTag must be provided (string)

port.description: Port used for SSH communication. Default `22` (string)

name.description: Name of virtualcenter config for Vsphere Cloud Provider config (string)

port.description: Port used for SSH communication. Default `22` (string)

folder.description: Folder for S3 service. Available from Rancher v2.2.7 (string)

Name of the host provisioned via docker machine (string)

dnsPolicy.description: Ingress controller DNS policy. `ClusterFirstWithHostNet`, `ClusterFirst`, `Default`, and `None` are supported. [K8S dns Policy](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/dns-pod-service/#pod-s-dns-policy) (string)

plugin.description: Network provider plugin. `calico`, `canal` (default), `flannel`, `none` and `weave` are supported. (string)

dockerSocket.description: Docker socket on the node that will be used in tunneling (string)

internalAddress.description: Internal address that will be used for components communication (string)

nodeName.description: Name of the host provisioned via docker machine (string)

port.description: Port used for SSH communication. Default `22` (string)

roles.description: Node roles in k8s cluster. `controlplane`, `etcd` and `worker` are supported. (list)

services.description: Services to rotate their certs. `etcd`, `kubelet`, `kube-apiserver`, `kube-proxy`, `kube-scheduler` and `kube-controller-manager` are supported (list)

kubeApi.description: Kube API options for RKE services (list maxitems:1)

kubeController.description: Kube Controller options for RKE services (list maxitems:1)

kubelet.description: Kubelet options for RKE services (list maxitems:1)

kubeproxy.description: Kubeproxy options for RKE services (list maxitems:1)

scheduler.description: Scheduler options for RKE services (list maxitems:1)

backupConfig.description: Backup options for etcd service. Just for Rancher v2.2.x (list maxitems:1)

caCert.description: TLS CA certificate for etcd service (string)

gid.description: Etcd service GID. Default: `0`. For Rancher v2.3.x or above (int)

snapshot.description: Snapshot option for etcd service. Default `true` (bool)

uid.description: Etcd service UID. Default: `0`. For Rancher v2.3.x or above (int)

intervalHours.description: Interval hours for etcd backup. Default `12` (int)

s3BackupConfig.description: S3 config options for etcd backup (list maxitems:1)

safeTimestamp.description: Safe timestamp for etcd backup. Default: `false` (bool)

customCa.description: Base64 encoded custom CA for S3 service. Use filebase64(<FILE>) for encoding file. Available from Rancher v2.2.5 (string)

folder.description: Folder for S3 service. Available from Rancher v2.2.7 (string)

eventRateLimit.description: K8s event rate limit configuration. (list maxitem: 1)

podSecurityPolicy.description: Pod Security Policy option for kube API service. Default `false` (bool)

serviceClusterIpRange.description: Service Cluster ip Range option for kube controller service (string)

serviceNodePortRange.description: Service Node Port Range option for kube API service (string)

policy.description: Audit policy json encoded definition. `"apiVersion"` and `"kind":"Policy","rules"` fields are required in the json. Ex. `jsonencode({"apiVersion":"audit.k8s.io/v1","kind":"Policy","rules":[{"level":"RequestResponse","resources":[{"group":"","resources":["pods"]}]}]})` [More info](https://rancher.com/docs/rke/latest/en/config-options/audit-log/) (string)

eventRateLimit.description: K8s event rate limit configuration. (list maxitem: 1)

podSecurityPolicy.description: Pod Security Policy option for kube API service. Default `false` (bool)

serviceClusterIpRange.description: Service Cluster ip Range option for kube controller service (string)

serviceNodePortRange.description: Service Node Port Range option for kube API service (string)

policy.description: Audit policy json encoded definition. `"apiVersion"` and `"kind":"Policy","rules"` fields are required in the json. clusterCidr.description: Cluster CIDR option for kube controller service (string)

serviceClusterIpRange.description: Service Cluster ip Range option for kube controller service (string)

clusterDnsServer.description: Cluster DNS Server option for kubelet service (string)

clusterDomain.description: Cluster Domain option for kubelet service. Default `cluster.local` (string)

failSwapOn.description: Enable or disable failing when swap on is not supported (bool)

generateServingCertificate.description: [Generate a certificate signed by the kube-ca](https://rancher.com/docs/rke/latest/en/config-options/services/#kubelet-serving-certificate-requirements). Default `false` (bool)

infraContainerImage.description: Infra container image for kubelet service (string)

clusterDnsServer.description: Cluster DNS Server option for kubelet service (string)

clusterDomain.description: Cluster Domain option for kubelet service. Default `cluster.local` (string)

infraContainerImage.description: Infra container image for kubelet service (string)

maxUnavailableControlplane.description: RKE max unavailable controlplane nodes. Default: `1` (string)

maxUnavailableWorker.description: RKE max unavailable worker nodes. Default: `10%` (string)

deleteLocalData.description: Delete RKE node local data. Default: `false` (bool)

gracePeriod.description: RKE node drain grace period. Default: `-1` (int)

nodeName.description: Name of the host provisioned via docker machine (string)

provider.description:
The provider type for the rke package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

addonJobTimeout.description: RKE k8s cluster addon deployment timeout in seconds for status check (int)

addons.description: RKE k8s cluster user addons YAML manifest to be deployed (string)

addonsIncludes.description: RKE k8s cluster user addons YAML manifest urls or paths to be deployed (list)

apiServerUrl.description: (Computed) RKE k8s cluster api server url (string)

authentication.description: RKE k8s cluster authentication configuration (list maxitems:1)

bastionHost.description: RKE k8s cluster bastion Host configuration (list maxitems:1)

clusterName.description: RKE k8s cluster name used in the kube config (string)

clusterYaml.description: RKE k8s cluster config yaml encoded. Provider arguments take precedence over this one (string)

controlPlaneHosts.description: (Computed) RKE k8s cluster control plane nodes (list)

customCerts.description: Use custom certificates from a cert dir (string)
